price: 假若这座城被敌人四面攻破，而后敌军要求他们叛教，他们必定承诺。他们因为此事只耽延片刻。
arabic: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaw dukhilat ʿalayhim min aqṭārihā thumma su-ilū al-fit'nata laātawhā wamā talabbathū bihā illā yasīran
